body:
In the following PR, the macro name of the patch file became lowercase, resulting in a build error.
　https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/20647

Even if the URL of sse2neon is changed, the macro name remains SSE2NEON.h, so I don't think it is necessary to change the macro name of the patch file.

I have confirmed that I can build by modifying the macro name of the patch file of fermi, fermikit and ngmlr to uppercase.
title: Installation issue: fermi
